alert.note: Alert for Bay; Huron; Midland; Saginaw; Sanilac; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 3:00PM EST until December 24 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Midland, Bay, Huron, Saginaw, Tuscola and Sanilac Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and produce sporadic power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold conditions will persist into the weekend with wind chills below zero into Saturday and Sunday. Scattered lake effect snow showers may bring additional light accumulations into Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Bay; Huron; Midland; Saginaw; Sanilac; Tuscola
